function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of commitment to specific societal concerns or agendas by different levels of government (federal, provincial, municipal)","Impact":"Inconsistent implementation of policies related to health, safety, and resource use in buildings, leading to potential health and safety risks","Mitigation":"Collaborative efforts and communication between different levels of government to align on societal concerns and agendas","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, communication tools, and decision support systems","People":"Policy Makers, Policy Takers, building occupants","Owner":"Government bodies, regulatory authorities, building owners"},{"Description":"Inability to characterize the influence of regenerative and development practices within existing policy frameworks","Impact":"Loss of opportunity to integrate regenerative practices into building regulations, missing out on potential health and environmental benefits","Mitigation":"Research and development of adaptable policy frameworks to accommodate regenerative approaches, stakeholder engagement and education","Technologies":"Policy modeling and simulation tools, stakeholder engagement platforms","People":"Design professionals, community members, local and regional authorities","Owner":"Policy makers, regulatory bodies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of engagement and interaction between design professionals, communities, and stakeholders in implementing regenerative practices","Impact":"Limited adoption of regenerative approaches in building design and construction, leading to missed opportunities for improved health and sustainability","Mitigation":"Promotion of collaborative design practices, stakeholder involvement, knowledge sharing, and capacity building","Technologies":"Collaborative design platforms, knowledge sharing tools, stakeholder engagement platforms","People":"Design professionals, communities, stakeholders, local and regional authorities","Owner":"Design professionals, community organizations, local and regional authorities"}]}
